title: Poker Chatbot
subtitle: AI-Powered TDA Rules Assistant
description: An intelligent chatbot trained on Tournament Directors Association (TDA) rules that helps poker players and tournament directors get instant answers to rule questions.
longDescription: This AI-powered chatbot leverages advanced natural language processing to understand and respond to complex poker rule inquiries. Built with Python, Flask, and OpenAI's language models, it provides accurate, instant answers to TDA rule questions, helping maintain fair play and consistent rule enforcement in poker tournaments. The chatbot can handle nuanced questions about edge cases, tournament procedures, and rule clarifications.

title: Wander
subtitle: Hiking Trail Discovery App
description: A comprehensive hiking trail discovery application designed for outdoor enthusiasts. Wander helps users find nearby trails, view detailed information, and plan their next adventure with ease.
longDescription: Built with Java Spring Boot and Thymeleaf, Wander provides an intuitive interface for discovering hiking trails. The app features trail filtering, detailed descriptions, difficulty ratings, and location-based recommendations. Users can save favorite trails, read reviews, and get real-time weather information for their planned hikes.

title: CarLister
subtitle: Vehicle Marketplace Platform
description: A comprehensive vehicle marketplace where users can buy and sell cars with ease. CarLister provides a secure platform for automotive transactions with advanced search and filtering capabilities.
longDescription: CarLister is a full-featured automotive marketplace built with modern web technologies. The platform includes user authentication, advanced search filters, image galleries, and secure messaging between buyers and sellers. Features include vehicle listings, user profiles, search functionality, and a responsive design that works across all devices.

title: Konami Code
subtitle: Interactive Easter Egg
description: A fun interactive web application that demonstrates the classic Konami Code easter egg. Enter the secret sequence to unlock hidden features and animations.
longDescription: This project showcases JavaScript event handling and DOM manipulation by implementing the famous Konami Code (↑↑↓↓←→←→BA). The application features smooth animations, visual feedback, and a responsive design that works on both desktop and mobile devices. It's a great example of creative web development and user interaction design.

title: My Tetris
subtitle: Classic Game Implementation
description: A JavaScript implementation of the classic Tetris game. Features include score tracking, increasing difficulty levels, and smooth gameplay mechanics.
longDescription: My Tetris is a complete implementation of the classic Tetris game using vanilla JavaScript. The game includes all standard Tetris features: piece rotation, line clearing, score tracking, and increasing speed. The project demonstrates advanced JavaScript concepts including game loops, collision detection, and state management. While not 100% complete, it showcases strong programming fundamentals and game development skills.

title: JS Scheduler
subtitle: Business Schedule Management
description: A comprehensive scheduling application designed for small businesses to manage employee schedules, appointments, and time tracking efficiently.
longDescription: JS Scheduler is a full-stack web application that helps small businesses manage their scheduling needs. The platform includes employee management, shift scheduling, time tracking, and reporting features. Built with modern web technologies, it provides an intuitive interface for creating and maintaining complex schedules while ensuring compliance with labor laws and business requirements.

title: Weather App
subtitle: Real-time Weather Information
description: A dynamic weather application that provides real-time weather information for any location worldwide. Features include current conditions, forecasts, and interactive maps.
longDescription: This weather application integrates multiple APIs to provide comprehensive weather information. Users can search for any location and receive current weather conditions, hourly forecasts, and 7-day predictions. The app includes interactive maps, weather alerts, and a responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices. Built with jQuery and modern web APIs, it demonstrates strong API integration and user experience design.

title: Bitcoin Miner
subtitle: Cryptocurrency Mining Tool
description: A Python-based Bitcoin mining application designed for educational purposes. Demonstrates blockchain technology and cryptocurrency mining concepts.
longDescription: This Bitcoin miner is an educational project that demonstrates the fundamentals of blockchain technology and cryptocurrency mining. Written in Python, it includes features like hash calculation, difficulty adjustment, and blockchain validation. While designed for learning purposes, it showcases advanced Python programming concepts including cryptography, networking, and concurrent processing.
